page.title: 16Leisure Activities Cont.
page.content: The village Community centre has many leisure activties during the week.On Monday+Tuesday afternoons the OAP have their meetings whilst on Tuesday evening there is Bingo for an hour and a half. There is a historical society who hold their meetings on a Wednesday. {Cwmavon}like{Pontrhydyfen}has its own rugby club which also boasts{5 {mini_rugby teams .}It also has a Bowling Green and Club with players in the Welsh team. They have a{Football {club}for the youngsters and the older men and also{3}Tennis Courts. There is an outdoor swimming pool in{Cwmavon}for the young children, it is about 4ft 5 inches deep. Next to that is a cricket pitch where they play cricket on Sundays and train on the other days.
